## Source: ossf-package-analysis (53470e96107ebc806b1a440821244a335389aca112b5752ce995ae87150b0b4d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'fake-package-agpl-license' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
